tool_description: Checks current inventory levels and stock velocity to inform restocking decisions.

item_barcode.description: Product barcode to check inventory for

error_messages: Product not found: Barcode does not exist in inventory system.

usage: Provide item_barcode to check current stock levels across all warehouses, or specify warehouse_locations for targeted inventory checking.

days_of_inventory.description: Days until stock depletion at current sales rate

stock_status.description: Current stock status: overstocked, normal, low, out_of_stock
